1.19.4.1.1.1:
- Added mushrooms caves
- Added sunshroom and moonshroom
- Updated brown bear texture
- [Bugfix] Fixed heart gingerbread form craft
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/forest-x-reborn
1.19.4.1.1.0:
- Added silver
- Silver tools created in the workbench have smite enchantment by default
- Added new biome - Old growth forest
- Added gingerbread block and gingerbread bricks
- Added blue rose
- Generation of the volcanic biome has been redesigned
- Added crafts dye from flowers
- Added a new achievement
- Added dependency on the GeckoLib mod
- Updated panorama
- Easter eggs removed
- [Bugfix] Fixed dry thorn forest generation
- [Bugfix] Fixed the second layer of semi-desert and marble caves
- [Bugfix] Fixed the speed of the fennec
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/forest-x-reborn
1.19.4.1.0.2:
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug due to which rhyolite slabs, stairs and wall could be generated in the world
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/forest-x-reborn
1.19.4.1.0.1:
- Update mod to MC 1.19.4
- Added 16 painted eggs
- Added new achievements
- Gold and emeralds in large quantities can now be found in the volcanic biome
- Raccoons now reproduce with the help of fruits and berries
- Improved raccoon behavior
- Improved behavior and characteristics of the brown bear
- Removed salt forever
- Mod logo changed
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug that caused raccoons not to breed
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/forest-x-reborn

1.19.2.1.0.0:
- The fist release mod
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/forest-x-reborn
